subject: Steroids
Perjury
Decisions and Verdicts
Baseball
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The panel of eight women and four men walked out of the jury room looking spent, with drooping shoulders and blank looks on their faces, as they again failed to render a verdict.
